source.name: nlp definition

answers.answer: The ability for computers to interpret written and spoken words like a human.
The ability for computers to interpret written words like a human.
The ability for computers to interpret spoken words like a human.
The ability for humans to interpret written and spoken words like a computer.

source.guidance: Natural language processing is when computers can understand both written and spoken words like a human. Computers do not have to perform both tasks at the same time. Chatbots work with written text, while virtual assistants like Siri and Alexa primarily work with spoken words.
